name: 斯戴芬妮·斯考特 Stefanie Scott

　　Scott was born December 6, 1996[citation needed] in Chicago, Illinois.[1] She appeared in the role of Katie in Beethoven's Big Break. Most recently she filmed the feature film Flipped directed by Rob Reiner as well as the feature film titled No Strings Attached where she played a young version of the main character.　　Scott also was the voice of Emma on the new Disney animated TV series Special Agent Oso premiering in April, 2009 on The Disney Channel.[2] Scott also had a guest starring role on the Fox series Sons of Tucson as well as on NBC series Chuck playing the adult Sarah Walker. Scott is also a singer, songwriter, penning the lyrics to several original songs including "Shoulda Woulda Coulda".[3] and "The Girl I Used To Know."　　She currently co-stars in the Disney Channel Original Series A.N.T. Farm as one of the main characters, Lexi Reed.
